column4: I have a Macbook pro that I am going to dual boot Ubuntu 9.10 and Snow Leopard. Should I go with the x64 or x86 version of Ubuntu?
i always go w/ 32bit.. but 64bit has come a long way w/ compatibility
I have 4GB's of memory in this laptop, so that was why I was thinking of going with 64bit
i guess if that 500mb of ram that it won't recognize means that much to you, then use 64bit.
